typed.subtitle: lazy Saturday stack
notes: add a splash of milk if the batter feels thick
lightly oil the pan so the edges crisp
steps: Whisk egg + buttermilk, then slide in the oil.
Stir flour, sugar, powder, soda, salt in another bowl.
Tip dry into wet and fold just until streaks fade.
Blueberries go in gentle right before the skillet.
Drop spoonfuls on a hot greased pan; when bubbles pop and edges dry, flip once and cook golden.
